talk.author: did:plc:6u3duqg62arfuu6e7tk532l5
talk.utter: Also, are you comparing a Black person who suffered and died in enslavement to a non-sentient non-person?

talk.author: did:plc:svbcgtpq5cnldy5rmmvflsui
talk.utter:
Yes. That's correct. The fact that you refer to a living human at any stage of their life as "non-person" is exactly my point.
       You devalue them in the same way democrats devalued black people..

talk.author: did:plc:6u3duqg62arfuu6e7tk532l5
talk.utter:
You're the one devaluing Black people by comparing them to non-sentient non-persons. That's racist as hell.

A non-sentient fetus is not a person. That's just a fact.

talk.author: did:plc:6u3duqg62arfuu6e7tk532l5
talk.utter:
You're the one devaluing Black people by comparing them to non-sentient non-persons. That's racist as hell.

A non-sentient fetus is not a person. That's just a fact.

talk.author: did:plc:svbcgtpq5cnldy5rmmvflsui
talk.utter: No, Its a lie you have to tell yourself and others to justify killing them.

talk.author: did:plc:6u3duqg62arfuu6e7tk532l5
talk.utter: You can't kill something that emits as many brain waves as a person who's been declared legally dead.

talk.author: did:plc:6u3duqg62arfuu6e7tk532l5
talk.utter:
Who said a fetus isn't human, dear?

You're insistence that a fetus is a baby is actually showing us *you* are the one who believes a fetus isn't a human. 

If a fetus is as precious as your living breathing child call it a fetus and do it loudly.

talk.author: did:plc:svbcgtpq5cnldy5rmmvflsui
talk.utter: She WAS a fetus and was just as precious. I sang to her. Killing her would have been wrong.

talk.author: did:plc:6u3duqg62arfuu6e7tk532l5
talk.utter:
My daughters and granddaughters were once fetuses too.

Just because they're no longer fetuses doesn't mean you can trade in their lives, health and future fertility for shiney new embyros.

Every pregnant person is someone's irreplaceable child and a million times more precious than any conception.

talk.author: did:plc:6u3duqg62arfuu6e7tk532l5
talk.utter:

Just because they're no longer fetuses doesn't mean you can trade in their lives, health and future fertility for shiney new embyros.

talk.author: did:plc:svbcgtpq5cnldy5rmmvflsui
talk.utter: What turned your daughters and granddaughters into people?

talk.author: did:plc:6u3duqg62arfuu6e7tk532l5

talk.author: did:plc:es365hrajwyslvb45hdho7z5
